Name: Havok
Description: For more than 20 years, Havok has enabled leading game developers across all platforms to create experiences that are rich, robust, and realistic. Today, more than half of the best-selling games are using Havok technology. Physics Engine, AI SDK, Cloth Physics.

Name: PhysX
Description: The NVIDIA PhysX SDK is a scalable multi-platform physics solution supporting a wide range of devices, from smartphones to high-end multicore CPUs and GPUs. PhysX is already integrated into some of the most popular game engines, including Unreal Engine, and Unity3D. The PhysX SDK is now open source, available under a BSD 3 license.

Name: Bullet
Description: Bullet Real-Time Physics Simulation | Home of Bullet and PyBullet: physics simulation for games, visual effects, robotics and reinforcement learning.

Name: Box2D
Description: A 2D Physics Engine for Games.

Name: Khronos Group
Description: Deploying and developing royalty-free open standards for 3D graphics, Virtual and Augmented Reality, Parallel Computing, Neural Networks, and Vision Processing. 3D Graphics (OpenGL and Vulkan).

Name: Microsoft DirectX Graphics
Description: Provides a set of APIs that you can use to create games and includes support for high-performance 2-D and 3-D graphics.

Name: Umbra
Description: Optimization for occulsion culling, shadow mapping, ray casting, and spatial awareness

Name: Vivox
Description: The voice & text chat platform that's trusted by the world's biggest gaming brands - now available for free.

Name: Photon Realtime
Description: Cross-Platform Networking Engine with multiplayer platform and services

Name: Mirror
Description: Mirror is a high level Networking API for Unity, supporting different low level Transports. Mirror is built and tested for MMO Scale Networking by the developers of uMMORPG, uSurvival and Cubica.

Name: Spatial OS
Description: Use our managed networking stack for real-time multiplayer games: create multiplayer games that push the boundaries of what game engines can do.

Name: GGPO
Description: GGPO networking SDK pioneered the use of rollback networking in peer-to-peer games.  It's designed specifically to hide network latency in fast paced, twitch style games which require very precise inputs and frame perfect execution. Designed specifically network latency in fighting games.

Name: Audiokinetic Wwise
Description: Audiokinetic Wwise - revolutionizing audio authoring and sound engine development tools for game developers and interactive media.

Name: FMOD Studio
Description: Made for games - FMOD Studio is fast, fluid and flexible software for creating adaptive music and sounds.

Name: Miles Sound System
Description: Miles features a no-compromise toolset that integrates high-level sound authoring with 2D and 3D digital audio, featuring streaming, environmental and convolution reverb, multistage DSP filtering, and multichannel mixing, and highly-optimized audio decoders (MP3, Ogg and Bink Audio).

Name: Elias Studio
Description: The Elias Studio is game composer’s tool for intuitively arranging adaptive music scores with unrivaled ease of use. You arrange your pre-recorded music files and decide how the music will transition in the game. With this tool, the composer can have complete control of the game soundtrack, and make everything ready for the game developer.

Name: Fabric
Description: Fabric provides a plethora of audio features and custom user interfaces that allow developers to design great audio. It’s nested component hierarchy allows users to create complex audio structures and combined with its event based system Fabric reduces the dependency on programmers giving more power to the sound-designers to work independently. Plugins available for Unity and Unreal.

Name: Dolby Atmos
Description: Welcome to Dolby Developer, your hub for information, sample code and advice on how to best use Dolby technologies for your project.  Whether you're developing for web, mobile, PC or a console game Dolby Developer has the answers to your audio questions. Game Engine Sound Plugin.

Name: Coherent Gameface
Description: Use the best technology for rich and interactive UI, reduce development time, use the most powerful visual tools, and be in control with Coherent Gameface. Game Engine UI Plugin, HTML/CSS/JS.

Name: Noesis GUI
Description: NoesisGUI is a lightweight cross-platform C++ game user interface library based on XAML and optimized for GPUs. Game Engine UI SDK.

Name: Mercuna
Description: Mercuna specializes in powerful navigation middlewares for AI in games. Our products are suitable for flying, underwater, character, vehicle and animal AIs. Advance Plugins available for Game Engines.

Name: Spiritai
Description: Character Engine is an authoring tool and SDK for building AI-powered virtual characters. Conversations with virtual characters are driven using Natural Language Understanding, AI, and procedurally generated performances.

Name: Kythera
Description: Advance AI and Navigation middleware fro CryEngine, Lumberyard, or Unreal Engine

Name: Bink
Description: Bink is the defacto video codec for games. It has been licensed for over 15,000 games on 14 different platforms!

Name: NexPlayerSDK
Description: Low Latency Video Player SDK

Name: Genvidtech
Description: Genvid's SDK enables developers to create and deliver premium interactive broadcasts to livestreaming audiences.

Name: Simul
Description: trueSKY weather renderer is the ultimate turnkey solution for sky, cloud and weather. Plugins available for UE4, Unity or SDK | Click to Try for FREE.

Name: Imgtec
Description: SDK and tools, documentation and support from one of the world's largest engineering teams dedicated to graphics processor development. Mobile VR SDK.

Name: Mod.io
Description: Support modding on PC, console and mobile with mod.io, a platform which makes it easy to grow, manage and integrate UGC in-game, using our API, SDK and plugins for Unity, Unreal Engine and more.

Name: Haden Aether Engine
Description: Aether Engine is a spatial simulation application. It dynamically scales, providing more computing power as simulations grow in complexity.

Name: Facebook Games SDKs
Description: SDKs to integrate your games into the various Facebook Gaming platforms

Name: GeForce NOW Developer Program
Description: SDK for integrating your game with the GeForce NOW cloud gaming service

Name: Raylib
Description: raylib is a simple and easy-to-use library to enjoy videogames programming.

Name: SDL
Description: A cross-platform development library designed to provide low level access to audio, keyboard, mouse, joystick, and graphics hardware via OpenGL and Direct3D

Name: SFML
Description: composed of five modules: system, window, graphics, audio and network

Name: LWJGL
Description: Library that enables cross-platform access to popular native APIs useful in the development of graphics (OpenGL, Vulkan), audio (OpenAL) and parallel computing (OpenCL) applications.

Name: Kha
Platforms: Windows, Mac, Linux, iOS, Android, Web
Description: Ultra-portable, high performance, open source multimedia framework. Targets all major operating systems and consoles.
